mapper.select: SELECT * FROM PRODUCT WHERE LCNO = 1 AND PSTOCK > 0

SELECT B.*, P.* , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARDCOMMENT WHERE BNO = B.BNO AND CSTATUS = 'Y' AND REVIEW = 'N') AS COMMENTCOUNT , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT USERID FROM LIKELIST WHERE BNO = 200 GROUP BY USERID)) AS BLIKE FROM BOARD B, PRODUCT P WHERE (B.BNO = P.BNO) AND B.BNO = #{ bNo }
SELECT * FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE BNO = #{ bNo } ORDER BY ANO

SELECT A.* , (SELECT NICKNAME FROM MEMBER WHERE USERID = A.USERID) AS WRITER , TO_CHAR(CDATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:mi') AS DATE2CHAR FROM BOARDCOMMENT A WHERE A.BNO = #{ bNo } AND A.CSTATUS = 'Y' AND A.REVIEW = 'N' ORDER BY CDATE, BCNO
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET VIEWS = VIEWS + 1 WHERE BNO = #{ bNo } AND BSTATUS = 'Y'
INSERT INTO LIKELIST VALUES(SEQ_LNO.NEXTVAL, #{ bNo } , DEFAULT ,DEFAULT)
